hero.heading: Welcome to Howard County Association of the Deaf
hero.text: Empowering the Deaf community with resources and events.

aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.text: HCADeaf is a non-profit organization dedicated to empowering the Deaf community in Howard County. We provide resources, support services, and educational programs to promote inclusion and communication access.

services.title: Education
services.description: Programs designed to support Deaf students.
